action.action-desc: Mr. Hultgren (for himself, Mr. David Scott of Georgia, and Mr. Messer) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require the disclosure of the annual percentage rates applicable to Federal student loans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Transparency in Student Lending Act.
Section 455(p) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087e(p)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking Each institution and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.header: Disclosure of apr at time of application
paragraph.text: In addition to the disclosures required under paragraph (1), each institution and contractor described in such paragraph shall disclose to a borrower before disbursement of a loan made under this part, in writing and in a form the borrower may keep, the annual percentage rate applicable to the loan, taking into account—

subparagraph.text: the stated interest rate of the loan;
the standard term for a loan of the same type;
any fees or additional costs associated with the loan; and
any capitalization of interest on the loan.
